title: Banned for 14 Days- For what?
body:
I actually need to know because I'm confused. 


1st game: 

-Game was going amazing. Ganked bot multiple times, we were winning.
-Karthus complains he didn't get any ganks so he starts taking all my jungle farm near mid game.
-I'm extremely behind now and it ruins my game too. 
-I'm like okay I will just report you and hopefully you'll be banned after game.
-I decide to split push instead of following my team because I feel it's 

a) unfair that I didn't get to farm and now I'm really behind
b) I don't really wanna group when I don't have much on me. I'd rather splitpush.

I repeatedly told my team that I prefer to just split push and I don't want to join the team fights. 

2nd game: 

I was a LITTLE bit toxic yes.

-Someone threatened to kick my ass. I said something along the lines of "I'm 6.5 and built way more than you so I could break you if I wanted to. But I don't want to keep going with this" 

-Continued to just play the game smooth. 

Automatically banned for 14 days. Can someone explain this please? I also don't expect riot to do anything but now I am extremely confused.
